alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 10:15AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Montana, including the following county, Gallatin. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1015 AM MST, emergency management reported an ice jam near the advisory area. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northern Gallatin County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
